Package gobblin.hive

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HiveConstants
    A class containing constants used in HiveTable and HivePartition.
    HiveLock
    A striped lock class for Hive databases or tables.
    HiveMetaStoreClientFactory
    An implementation of BasePooledObjectFactory for IMetaStoreClient.
    HiveMetastoreClientPool
    A pool of IMetaStoreClient for querying the Hive metastore.
    HiveMetastoreClientPool.MultiClient
    A class wrapping multiple named IMetaStoreClients.
    HivePartition
    A class that represents a Hive partition.
    HivePartition.Builder  
    HivePartitionComparator<T extends HivePartitionComparator<?>>
    An extension to HiveRegistrationUnitComparator for HivePartitions.
    HiveRegister
    A class for registering Hive tables and partitions.
    HiveRegisterStep
    CommitStep to perform a Hive registration.
    HiveRegisterUtils
    Utility class for registering data into Hive.
    HiveRegistrationUnit
    A class that represents a Hive table or partition.
    HiveRegistrationUnit.Column  
    HiveRegistrationUnitComparator<T extends HiveRegistrationUnitComparator<?>>
    A comparator between an existing HiveRegistrationUnit and a new HiveRegistrationUnit.
    HiveRegProps
    An extension to State for Hive registration.
    HiveSerDeManager
    This class manages SerDe properties (including schema properties) for Hive registration.
    HiveSerDeWrapper
    A wrapper around SerDe that bundles input format, output format and file extension with a SerDe, and provides additional functionalities.
    HiveTable
    A class that represents a Hive table.
    HiveTable.Builder  
    HiveTableComparator<T extends HiveTableComparator<?>>
    An extension to HiveRegistrationUnitComparator for HiveTables.
    PartitionDeregisterStep
    CommitStep to deregister a Hive partition.
    TableDeregisterStep
    CommitStep to deregister a Hive table.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    HiveSerDeManager.Implementation  
    HiveSerDeWrapper.BuiltInHiveSerDe
